topics.body: So there is an episode of Avengers Assemble where all the Avengers started Hulking out. Steve, Tony, Thor, Clint, and Roy start turning into Hulks and losing control and the ACTUAL Hulk is standing there going "All right bros just calm down." It's kind of goofy but it serves to illustrate how much control Banner and Hulk need to not go on a rampage. Treat everything like an egg. It's a goddamn shame that this show only got one season.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee6ea46368723d9da50000#post_54ee6ea46368723d9da50000
It ends on a really cute note too.
[spoiler]Apparently Banner built a device to syphon Gamma radiation but because Hulk is a living Gamma reactor, the device would just kill him, So Hulk decided to hide it, He showed it's location to Black Widow to help De-Hulk the other Avengers AND as a contingency on case he ever goes berserk.[/spoiler]
